name: Pivop
description:
One button, heart collecting, head swinging action, right here in your browser.

Ramiro Corbetta, a colleague of mine at Long Island University, is running a game-a-week class this semester and I decided to follow along. The first week's prompt was "one button".

I started work on this game on Wednesday and finished it up on Saturday.

The visuals were made using Fernando Ramallo's Doodle Studio 95, which I highly recommend.
